scenario_text.value: Let’s split up, then!

What? Don’t be stupid. We have no idea what’s
out there, right?

And if the person attacked is all alone?
They’d be done for.
It’s risky to split up. You’re right.

(It’s better to search separately.
We need to find them, and fast!)

(But it’d be awful to be attacked alone.
How many monsters are out there?)
(What’s the best way to search?)
Stick together.
Split up, it’s faster!
Groups of two?

It would be real bad to be attacked while
alone. Shouldn’t we stick together?

But what would be the point of all us
tromping through the forest?

We need to stay safe.
The hunters don’t need to be hunted.

We have to find them, and fast!
Let’s split up. It’s more efficient.

That’s true, but...
What if we’re attacked?

They might have been attacked already!
All the more reason to find them fast!
Maybe we should be in groups of two?
That’s a plan! Let’s do that!

But then whoever gets Ryo will be stuck with
the short end of the stick!

Hey, Minoru!
Don’t say that!

There doesn’t seem to be anything dangerous
around here. We’ll be OK.

There’s a slight odor still, but we’re
probably fine!
And no matter what, we’ll protect you!

What a joke! Unlike you, this thing can’t
even talk!

If we go into the forest, he might just go
back to his nest or whatever!
Kunemon wouldn’t do that!
Yeah, he’ll protect Ryo, for sure!
Shaddup! I said I’m not going in there!

I’ll look around here. Okay? And if something
happens, hurry back!
Let’s just leave him.
All right...
